column5: I love this show for some reason .... I'm bigger than this guy and would NEVER be able to eat 1/3 as much as he does.   Randy
I seen a marathon on Sunday and it was awesome. I can't get over the 30lb pizza with 7 pounds of cheese on it.
i love that show. my gf still holds firm i could beat most of the challenges he does! lol, i wanna go to florida and get them "fire in your hole" wings!! lol
great show - i like the inside looks at all the diners a little more than the gluttony part.  if you like this show you'd probably like guy fieri's Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives on food network.
I watch & enjoy the show as well - The host/eater fasts/non eats/drinks alot of water the day before a challenge as well as exercising/working out twice aday on non challenge days............
good show i want to try the 4 horseman burger it looks awesome
I like the show a lot, Boudain's "No reservations" is my favorite though.  -Ben
If you don't eat the day before it makes your stomach shrink and it would be harder to eat a 5 lb burger
anthony bourdain fans should read kitchen confidential, especially if youve worked in the food industry!

I wish Ontario has more places like man vs food or Dinner, drive ins and dives. But then again we be all over weight like Americans. Does anyone have a special restaurant they would like to share that are like those you see on the food network
